snippet.title: Dragon Quest VIII Mobile Remaster v0.3.3 -- NFGD 2023
snippet.description:
A shortened trailer for DQ8MR, submitted for Nintendo Fan Game Direct (NFGD) 2023.

Mod page here: https://sites.google.com/view/dq8mr

Older (more detailed) preview here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-KNmYmhoVbk

-----------------------------------------------------
